description: black lettering on white paper [FRIENDS OF THE ARTIST/ A SUITE OF SEVEN ETCHINGS AND/ LITHOGRAPHS BY BARBARA SWAN] at top center [IMPRESSIONS WORKSHOP BOSTON 1970] at bottom center
portfolio: From Friends of the Artist: A Suite of Seven Etchings and Lithographs
provenance: John E. Andrus III, Wayzata, Minn. (until d. 2012); by descent to his daughter Catherine Andrus, Minneapolis; given to MIA, 2018.
text: This is the title page to a portfolio of seven portraits that Barbara Swan made of artist friends who worked in New England. The portraits are of Sigmund Abeles, Bernard Chaet, Michael Mazur, Arthur Polonsky, Harold Tovish, Elbert Weinberg, and Swan herself.
title: Title Page
